title: Live stream from State Emergency Operations Center

organizations.name: state emergency operations center state emergency operati
governor's office of emergency services - state operations center

text:
February 12, 2017 7:18 PM Live stream from State Emergency Operations Center State Emergency Operations Center frame grab i 
This is a live view of the activity going on at the California Governor's Office of Emergency Services - State Operations Center near Sacramento. Evacuees wait to fill gas tanks at Quik Stop on Hwy 99 and Bogue Road 0:07 Streams of cars seen fleeing Oroville area 1:08 Lake Oroville eyes new storms expected to arrive Thursday 1:22 Sacramento area flooding through the years: 1862-2017 0:44 Dramatic video captures break at Oroville Dam spillway as concrete chunks sent flying 0:46 See water rush at Oroville Dam as untested emergency spillway activated 0:53 Workers take to air to prep electrical towers near Oroville Dam as emergency spillway is activated 1:43 Water continues to rush down Oroville spillway on Friday 1:39 Neighbors in Elmhurst neighborhood oppose real estate agent's plan to turn home into commercial office Share Video
